evalPoints(Player) - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.model.objectives.publicobjectives.ColorDiagonalsObjective
The points are evaluated as it follows: all diagonally adjacent dice with the same color are counted.
evalPoints(Player) - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.model.objectives.publicobjectives.ColorVarietyObjective
The points are evaluated as it follows: this objective gives 4 points to the player for each set of one of each color anywhere on his window
evalPoints(Player) - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.model.objectives.publicobjectives.ColumnColorVarietyObjective
The points are evaluated as it follows: this objective gives 5 points to the player for each column of his window with no repeated colors

evalPoints(Player) - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.model.objectives.publicobjectives.DeepShadesObjective
The points are evaluated as it follows: this objective gives 2 points to the player for each set of 5 and 6 values anywhere
evalPoints(Player) - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.model.objectives.publicobjectives.LightShadesObjective
The points are evaluated as it follows: this objective gives 2 points to the player for each set of 1 and 2 values anywhere
evalPoints(Player) - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.model.objectives.publicobjectives.MediumShadesObjective
The points are evaluated as it follows: this objective gives 2 points to the player for each set of 3 and 4 values anywhere
